content: निश्चयः {@--1@} Ascertainment, investigation, inquiry. {@--2@} A fixed opinion, settled or firm conviction, firm belief. {@--3@} A determination, resolution, resolve; एष मे स्थिरो निश्चयः <ls>Mu. 1.</ls> {@--4@} Certainty, positiveness, positive conclusion. {@--5@} Fixed intention, design, purpose, aim; कैकेयी क्रूरनिश्चय <ls>R. 12. 4</ls>; <ls>Ku. 5. 5.</ls> {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of a figure in Rhetoric.
